attributes.action: Mandatory drug screening for all cabinet ministers
attributes.additional_details: Rumours are rife  of alcohol and drug abuse within , parliament . It is time for them to prove they are not under the influence of drugs or drink when passing laws .
attributes.background: HM Government makes and passes laws that affect us all. Whilst making these laws , all members of the HM Givernment must be clear of any drugs that may hinder their ability to govern the people.

rejection.details:
It's not clear whether this petition is intended to apply to all MPs, or just Cabinet Ministers. We already have a petition calling for drug tests for all MPs:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/120491
